content.raw: Should all the headers define `_USE_MATH_DEFINES`? You've only changed some of them.
content.html: Should all the headers define _USE_MATH_DEFINES? You've only changed some of them.

content.raw: I've moved all math.h ot <cmath> but only include the defines in the needed ones, which are those where the code is using M_PI. I don't think that we need to introduce it in all of them. In that case, probably we could try passing it as a compiler flag.
content.html: I've moved all math.h ot <cmath> but only include the defines in the needed ones, which are those where the code is using M_PI. I don't think that we need to introduce it in all of them. In that case, probably we could try passing it as a compiler flag.

content.raw: I wasn't sure if 3rd-party code would need them, but they can always define that first before including `ignition/math/..`. Should be fine.
content.html: I wasn't sure if 3rd-party code would need them, but they can always define that first before including ignition/math/... Should be fine.
